title: Smart Data Models - ExcCZ
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Czech Proportion/Integral Exciter.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcCZ

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output maximum limit (Efdmax). Default: 0.0

efdmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output minimum limit (Efdmin). Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke). Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator proportional gain (Kp). Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator time constant (Ta). Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator integral time constant (Tc). Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te). Default: 0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator maximum limit (Vrmax). Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator minimum limit (Vrmin). Default: 0.0
